Title: Myson Floortec TOUCH under floor heating touch screen thermostat and remote sensor
Description: Designed especially with underfloor heating systems in mind, the Myson Floortec Touch programmable thermostat with remote floor sensor provides optional 24 hour, 5/2 or 7 day programming for heating to suit a daily or weekly schedule. Title: Polypipe UFH Systems 2-wire valve actuator
Description: This Polypipe two wire valve actuator opens and closes a heating circuit on Polypipe's underfloor heating Smart Plus manifold in reaction to heat demand. Helping to improve your system's energy efficiency by allowing individual room temperature control, this UFCH valve actuator mechanism can help save on utility bills and minimise waste. The actuator uses a PTC resistor-heated wax element and compression spring, the operating voltage applying heat to the wax elevment and therefore moving an integrated ram. The force generated by this movement is transferred to the valve motor for operation of the actuator.
category: Heating/Underfloor Heating/Underfloor Heating Thermostats and Controls/Underfloor Heating Thermostats and Controls.csv -> Polypipe UFH Systems 2-wire valve actuator
